pages.text: The $(9)World Tier Select Screen$() is your all-inclusive page for learning about and managing $(6)World Tiers$().$(p)It can be opened using the "Open World Tier Select" keybind, which defaults to CTRL+T.

pages.title: Activating Tiers
pages.text: Tiers do not activate automatically. When you unlock a new tier, you first need to use the "Activate" button to enable it.$(p)You can select a tier by clicking the Tier's symbol in the screen, and then activate it using the button.

pages.title: Tier Information
pages.text: To view information about a tier, select the tier, then press the "Detailed Info" button.$(p)This will show you the rarity and purity weights for that tier, as well as any Tier Augments that will be applied.

pages.title: Notes
pages.text: You may switch between Tiers at any time.$(p)In multiplayer, multiple players may have different Tiers without impacting eachother. Most content will resolve the Tier of the closest player.
